name: Adele Robots
tag_list: robots, robotics, artificial-intelligence, avatars, technology, tech, software, hardware, devices
overview:
Another way to understand the world is possible. At least we can turn the material society model into another more human. Be realistic, people are the core and the mesure of the world. Be bold, the moment to establish the bases of the coexistence between human beings and robots has arrived.

Adele Robots was created in 2010 with the aim to make life easier for people. That eagerness and dream make all our energies were focused on finding out the formula to integrate robots into society, making them part of our lives.

video_embeds.description: Fiona, Fiona, the community for the creation of an artificial mind
